description: Mobile techniques used by AndroRAT, ATT&CK software S0292 (v1.1)
name: AndroRAT (S0292)

techniques.comment: [AndroRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0292) gathers audio from the microphone.(Citation: Lookout-EnterpriseApps)(Citation: forcepoint_bitter)
[AndroRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0292) masquerades as legitimate applications.(Citation: forcepoint_bitter)(Citation: blackberry_mobile_malware_apt_esp)
[AndroRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0292) collects contact list information.(Citation: Lookout-EnterpriseApps)(Citation: forcepoint_bitter)
[AndroRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0292) collects the device’s location through GPS or through network settings.(Citation: forcepoint_bitter)
[AndroRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0292) can take photos and videos using the device cameras.(Citation: forcepoint_bitter)
